summary: This document is an email chain from July 2020 between FBI Victim Services Division personnel regarding the finalization and approval of a victim outreach list for the Epstein case, specifically mentioning the addition of a tab with attorney information.

persons.name: Program Manager FBI Victim Services Division
persons.context: Recipient and approver of an email containing a victim outreach list for the Epstein case, giving final approval for the list to be sent out.

persons.name: Victim Outreach Strategist Case Support Unit FBI - Victim Services Division
persons.context: Sender of the initial email containing the victim outreach list, which includes a new tab with attorney information, seeking approval from the Program Manager.

connections.person1: Program Manager FBI Victim Services Division
connections.person2: Victim Outreach Strategist Case Support Unit FBI - Victim Services Division
connections.description: Professional colleagues within the FBI's Victim Services Division, collaborating on finalizing a victim outreach list for the Epstein case.

events.title: Finalization of Epstein Victim Outreach List
events.description: FBI Victim Services Division personnel correspond to finalize and approve a victim outreach list for the Epstein case, with the addition of a tab containing attorney information.
personsInvolved: Program Manager FBI Victim Services Division
Victim Outreach Strategist Case Support Unit FBI - Victim Services Division

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division was actively managing victim outreach for the Epstein case as of July 2020.
A specific outreach list was being finalized, which included a dedicated tab with attorney information and representation details.
The email chain shows internal FBI approval processes for victim-related communications in the case.
